exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a flat bench and press a barbell up from chest level

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Classic bodyweight exercise performed in a plank position

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.description: Lie on a bench and bring dumbbells together in an arc motion

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: Press dumbbells on an incline bench to target upper chest

exercises.name: Cable Crossover
exercises.description: Pull cables from high position across body in hugging motion

exercises.name: Decline Push-ups
exercises.description: Push-ups with feet elevated on a bench or platform

exercises.name: Chest Dips
exercises.description: Dips with forward lean to emphasize chest activation

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Hang from a bar and pull your body up until chin clears the bar

exercises.name: Barbell Rows
exercises.description: Bend over and row a barbell to your lower chest

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.description: Pull a cable bar down to chest level while seated

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
exercises.description: Single-arm rows with dumbbell, one knee on bench

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: Lift a barbell from the ground to hip level with straight back

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.description: Pull rope attachment towards face, focusing on rear delts

exercises.name: T-Bar Rows
exercises.description: Row using a T-bar machine or landmine attachment

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Barbell back squat targeting quads, glutes, and hamstrings

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward into a lunge position, alternating legs

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Push weight away using leg press machine

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlifts
exercises.description: Hip hinge movement targeting hamstrings and glutes

exercises.name: Leg Curls
exercises.description: Curl weight using hamstring curl machine

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
exercises.description: Single-leg squat with rear foot elevated on bench

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.description: Press a barbell overhead from shoulder level

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Raise dumbbells out to the sides until parallel with floor

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.description: Rotating dumbbell press named after Arnold Schwarzenegger

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.description: Raise dumbbells in front of body to shoulder height

exercises.name: Handstand Push-ups
exercises.description: Push-ups performed in a handstand position against wall

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Curl dumbbells from hips to shoulders

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Dips on a bench or parallel bars targeting triceps

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.description: Curls with neutral grip targeting brachialis

exercises.name: Skull Crushers
exercises.description: Lying tricep extension with EZ bar or dumbbells

exercises.name: Preacher Curls
exercises.description: Bicep curls performed on a preacher bench

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold body in straight line supported on forearms and toes

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Seated twist holding weight, alternating sides

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raises
exercises.description: Raise legs while hanging from a pull-up bar

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollouts
exercises.description: Roll ab wheel out and back while maintaining plank

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.description: Lie on back and alternate extending opposite arm and leg
